entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:49 PM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
